description: Installation of new mechanical plant and screening on existing rooftop.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( In accordance with submitted plans (17034/P110/P2, /P111/P2, /P120/P2, /P121/P2, Noise assessment and ventilation report and additional technical memo received 14 May 2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No installation or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 08:00 to 18:00 on Mondays to Friday and 09:00 to 13:00 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The applicant shall demonstrate that by submission to the local planning authority, prior to first use, the proposed scheme for mitigation against noise complies with the requirements of BB93 (2015) for all spaces occupied by pupils, through submission of post completion tests. The tests shall include reverberation time measurement.  Tests shall be conducted with windows closed and the ventilation operating at full duty, boost mode and mode for overheating.  If the work fails this test, remedial work to secure compliance shall be carried out and certified to that effect, with compliance certificates submitted to the local planning authority before the equipment is brought into use.
